Title: Establishes the failure to pass act restricting driving in a passing lane without overtaking or passing a vehicle
Summary: Establishes the failure to pass act restricting driving in a passing lane without overtaking or passing a vehicle and sets penalties for violations.
LawCode: Amd ยง1122, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to restricting driving in a passing lane without overtaking or passing a vehicle
